Sorry, you won't find a spark LOGO, I thought this through thoroughly, it's
still around, someone will have to find it. (There was a reason the babies
scattered.) And what does Kingler mean torture? he's a Psychological warfare
specialist, he wouldn't torture anyone.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 17, 2000 5:00 PM
Subject: Re: A light snack.


> ::KitKat::
>
> She stared at them in disbelief. "WHAT!"  She sat down and looked at
> Phobia's body.  She saw the mech fluid and the parts laying
> there. "Why did you do this Death? Why? I thought he was a loyal
> follower in the group. I though...." She stopped and looked at
> Death."You said you killed a bot who was a traitor to us all. I will
> have to ask that you prove it.  We may be predacons, but I need every
> bot available.  We will need everyone when we take up our major
> challenge.  But untill then, yes, you make analyze what ever you want
> from his body, but please show me proof that he was as you say he
> was."  She looked at Destructor,"I want checks on all personell in
> the group. And please check the computer systems, security systems
> ETC ETC.  I want to make sure everything is functioning properly when
> company comes."  She looked down again at Phobia's body. "Fetch me
> the spark out of him.  I may have use of it. I may be down a bot, but
> the others don't know that."  She looked at Death and back to
> Destrustor. "Anything else?"
>
> She had to hide her feelings deep. She had trusted phobia, considered
> him a friend. Now this.  She felt terrible about this.  She couldn't
> show weakness, but she felt berayed and hurt frim this.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
> >  DEstructor quickly followed kit kat. he entered the hall to find
> Death
> > awaiting him..."We have a problem he said. The one called
> Phobia..he is a
> > vile creature. I scanned his data tracks. What I found can not be
> described.
> > You must understand he would have found away to kill us all if had
> the
> > chance. I did what I had to do. He though I fear is not slain. When
> I killed
> > his body many of these little spiders cvame out. I fear they may
> rebuild him.
> > I wish to have them examined."
> >  Destructor put his hand on his old friends shoulder. "I understand
> but it is
> > not my place...you must ask our leader. For undertanding." they
> both turned
> > to kit kat in attention.
>
>
>
>
>
